website_summaries.verdict: A few quirks aside, this inexpensive snow scooter is head of the pack for its numerous features, durable build, and fun design suitable for kids and most adults.
pros: This model stands out for its sturdy handle, 3-mode LED lighting, and versatile design that can be used on snow and other surfaces
Adjusts easily to accommodate most kids and adults up to 220 pounds, and folds for storage
cons: A bit awkward for very tall individuals
Lights are great when they work, but some faulty ones have been reported

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren ages 11-17 enjoyed using their new Ski Skooters during our recent snow days. They jumped right on them and took off down the hill. The Skooters are easy to use and provided hours of fun. Would purchase again. I only gave four stars because they also tried them on the same grassy hill with no snow and even though they are supposed to work on grass, the kids say they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Knitty Kittty

customer_reviews.title: Need seller to send me 2 led lights with batteries as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: No led light, need to contact seller....grandkids like it but need the led light for safety...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in time for Snowpocolypse!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this last minute for impending snow storms. Showed up on time and it was so worth it. 13 yo son loved it, both as a scooter and to just sit down on (like a sled) for steeper slopes. Saved the day for a rare Seattle snowstorms. Had seen other reviewers talking about the missing light, but ours had one built in and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: KDGig

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: The kids were super excited to give this a try and the weather cooperated by dropping 8” of new snow 2 days after we received. It was fun watching them try it out but about 15 minutes into using it the handle snapped off of the board when my daughter fell and there is no way to fix it because the plastic is bent. Big waste of $40.
customer_reviews.author: flmom

customer_reviews.title: My child’s least favorite snow toy
customer_reviews.text: Handle keeps folding down during use. Front keeps going upwards as well so whole unit topples backward during use. Front end needs to be slightly weighed down and handle needs some sort of click in place system.
customer_reviews.author: Pedsdoc

customer_reviews.title: So slick, it scared the snow away
customer_reviews.text: Welp... we have high hopes. After the year's first snow fall, we thought it would be a very good year for snow in our (mid-east) area. So, we bought this for our son to enjoy the huge slope behind our house. Then it did not snow again. He did try and ride in the driveway on a warm sunny day. It didn't go far, but mom and dad had a great laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Supernova

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful winter toy for my daughter. When using a snow board alone, she tends to fall a lot. This has helped her learn to keep her balance and has provided hours of entertainment. It is sturdy enough for adults to use as well and holds up to 250 lbs. Certainly a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jswisher3

customer_reviews.title: Not as tough as you might think...
customer_reviews.text: WE love this sled so much and bought 2 for Christmas...but one came apart after a day sledding. My son is only 8 and was so bummed to have it break on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan G.

customer_reviews.title: knt5411
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a gift for my two nephews. I thought they look a little flimsy but the boys love them absolutely love them they could not stop talking about them and then when they finally got to use them on the mountain they really enjoyed them
customer_reviews.author: TinaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Light not included
customer_reviews.text: What we liked most about this particular ski scooter was the led headlight which made it unique from the others we researched. The large light shown in the picture doesn't come with it, only a small one towards the top of the handle is included.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha P

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and he hasn't used it yet (hasn't snowed) but he loved it. Felt very sturdy and he loved it (for a 9 year old boy) - now my son wants one too!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: The Younger Generation
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's love their scooters. They'd like more snow as they like racing and the scooters are great for that. Hearing such glowing reviews we "elders" are pleased with the scooters too. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. It is cheap - I give the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk - warning! Light that comes with sled falls out and doesn't function properly. It doesn't stay on or change colors. You have to order the multicolored LED light separate. Disappointed. It is cheap - I give the handle 2 days and it'll be broken off. They get your money you get an unhappy child and the landfill gets a little fuller with crap!
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Bought one to share, may need another now that I know it works well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to be shared by my 6.5 and 4.5 year old sons. We didn't have much snow left, but they found a small patch and were so excited to use it. I was surprised they got it to move as much as it did. They allowed a couple of their neighborhood friends to try it, too. Might need to buy a second one since it looks like it'll be a big hit - especially when the snow comes!! I don't know if it works well on grass yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all seasons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a grandson and a friend's son. They LOVED them! Very versatile--can use in the snow or on grass.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: BOYS LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this item. Its great because my 10 year old and my 15 year old both use it as it holds up to 220 lbs. They had a great time playing on the hill for hours. It held up great and my boys can be pretty rough.
customer_reviews.author: KellyW

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 7year old grandson,he got a chance to use it with the recent snow. He loves it! Works so well and the handle keeps him from falling off. So much fun!! Would recommend for sure. Also, delivered so quickly.. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Eagerly awaiting snow fall in VA!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it I the snow...but what's not to love!!!! Very well made and I don't know who is more excited to try it out...my 9 year old or me!!! We plan to take it to OBX this summer on the 4WD only section! Can't wait to surf down those dunes!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: VTHOKIES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for active 7 year old and older
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old Grandson has been trying to learn how to skateboard and thought that this scooter was for younger kids. Then he tried it! He loves it. He can sort of control where it goes, it goes quite fast which he loves and all the neighbors kids want one. I am glad that I bought it. I also bought a second scooter for my 4 year old Grandson. He is too young for it...can't keep it from sliding down the hill while he tries to get on it. But I know he will try it out on a future sledding adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun.. My son loves riding down the hill ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun.. My son loves riding down the hill in the snow on this snow scooter..
customer_reviews.author: Sinbar

customer_reviews.title: It might be better for older kids
customer_reviews.text: My son was incredibly excited to order this sled. But after ten minutes of trying to ride it, he gave up completely. He was 7. It might be better for older kids.
customer_reviews.author: BT and LT

customer_reviews.title: Should be a fun boy toy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these for my 4 grandsons as a Christmas gift. They were shipped in timely manner. Do not know how they will preform until the boys get to use them and they do seem sturdy so I’m sure they will love them as they love sledding and this will test their skills in a new way on the hills.
customer_reviews.author: Carly’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Super cute idea but way too hard to use. Out of 8 of us none of us can use these. We kept falling down every 2 seconds. The kids tried so many times but it was way too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Now I wish "Santa" had brought us two!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely LOVE IT!! It is a fantastic way to play in the snow. You have more control than on a sled, and being up off the snow helps you stay warmer. It seems to go a bit faster than a sled, so the kids basically fight over it. Should have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: HPC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this sled skooter! Big hit with the kids!

customer_reviews.title: Cool sled
customer_reviews.text: I have no skill but still loved this sled / snowboard.

customer_reviews.title: fun in the snow
customer_reviews.text: granddaughters are enjoying these. takes some getting used to for steering
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool!

customer_reviews.title: No LED -- no matter, great fun
customer_reviews.text: There is no LED light, but I think everyone gets that by now. I ordered it with this knowledge. No problem. This is hands-down the best snow toy my kids have had yet. The cheap plastic sleds broke after just one day of use. I purchased this days before we had a record-breaking snowfall here in Portland. This quickly became the most popular toy in the neighborhood, for both little kids and teens. Very sturdy and it is FAST. Too fast for very young children (under 7). A helmet is a must! I will purchase another for next winter because they were fighting over this one.

customer_reviews.title: This item is garbage. I'm convinced most of the positive reviews are ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. This item is garbage. I'm convinced most of the positive reviews are fake. It's made of cheap plastic and feels like it would fall apart the first time in the snow. It doesn't even come with the LED light that's in its name! This is, at most, a 20 dollar WalMart item. Don't waste your money.

I ordered for 2 of my kids and received 2 of the same color. Not a big deal, but would be nice to have been able to choose 2 different colors.

product_meta.title: Geospace Original LED Ski Skooter: Fold-up Snowboard Kick-Scooter for Use on Snow, Assorted Colors (Red, Purple or Blue)
feature_bullets: THE BEST IN WINTER FUN - Our premium designed Ski Skooter will provide hours of “snowboarding" winter fun for your kids. Great for use in your neighborhood, on snow covered hills, flat snow covered sidewalks or even up in the mountains.

MULTI USE SKOOTER - Cruise and zigzag down your favorite sledding hill; ride it like a scooter on sloped or flat compact snow covered surfaces. Just use one foot to push off the ground. Can even be used on grass, or sand dunes!

LIGHT FOR SAFETY - Our Ski Skooter includes one LED Light Module at the top of handle for max visibility & safety. The LED marker has 5 colors with flash, strobe and fade modes. Add a 2nd “Illuminator” 20-mode LED puck light at the base (sold separately).

SUPERIOR DESIGN - Super-tough polyurethane material flexes slightly for a smooth ride. The fold-up handle helps maintain balance & assists with steering, circular design provides better grip & hand positioning than other models with straight handles.

THE SPECS - For both Kids (6 years+) and Adults (Max weight 220 Lbs). One size fits all. Handle folds down for convenient transport and storage. Ski Skooter is 37” long, 9.50” wide and 31” high (when handle is up). Comes in assorted colors.
